Package org.opencv.android

Class NativeCameraView

java.lang.Object
android.view.View
android.view.SurfaceView
org.opencv.android.CameraBridgeViewBase
org.opencv.android.NativeCameraView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback
public class NativeCameraView extends CameraBridgeViewBase
This class is an implementation of a bridge between SurfaceView and OpenCV VideoCapture. The class is experimental implementation and not recoomended for production usage.
